verses.verse: I commend<WG4921> unto you<WG5213> Phebe<WG5402> our<WG2257> sister<WG79>, who is<WG5607> a servant<WG1249> of the church<WG1577> which is<WG3588> at<WG1722> Cenchrea<WG2747>:

That<WG2443> you receive<WG4327> her<WG846> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, as becomes<WG516> saints<WG40>, and<WG2532> that<WG2443> you assist<WG3936> her<WG846> in<WG1722><WG99999> whatever<WG302> business<WG4229> she has need<WG5535> of you<WG5216>: for<WG1063> she<WG846><WG99999> has been<WG1096> a helper<WG4368> of many<WG4183>, and<WG2532><WG99999> of myself<WG1700> also<WG2532>.
Greet<WG782> Priscilla<WG4252> and<WG2532> Aquila<WG207> my<WG3450> helpers<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424>:

Who<WG3748> have<WG5294> for<WG5228> my<WG3450> life<WG5590> laid down<WG5294> their own<WG1438> necks<WG5137>: unto whom<WG3739> not<WG3756> only<WG3441> I<WG1473> give thanks<WG2168>, but<WG235> also<WG2532> all<WG3956> the churches<WG1577> of the Nations<WG1484>.

Likewise<WG2532> greet the church<WG1577> that is in<WG2596> their<WG846> house<WG3624>. Greet<WG782> my<WG3450> wellbeloved<WG27> Epaenetus<WG1866>, who<WG3739> is<WG2076> the firstfruits<WG536> of Achaia<WG882> unto<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>.
Greet<WG782> Mary<WG3137>, who<WG3748> bestowed<WG2872> much<WG4183> labor<WG2872> on<WG1519> us<WG2248>.

Greet<WG782> Andronicus<WG408> and<WG2532> Junia<WG2458>, my<WG3450> kinsmen<WG4773>, and<WG2532> my<WG3450> fellowprisoners<WG4869>, who<WG3748> are<WG1526> of note<WG1978> among<WG1722> the apostles<WG652>, who<WG3739> also<WG2532> were<WG1096> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> before<WG4253> me<WG1700>.
Greet<WG782> Amplias<WG291> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.
Greet<WG782> Urbane<WG3773>, our<WG2257> helper<WG4904> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>, and<WG2532> Stachys<WG4720> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27>.
Greet<WG782> Apelles<WG559> approved<WG1384> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547>. Greet<WG782> them which are<WG3588> of<WG1537> Aristobulus<WG711>' household.
Greet<WG782> Herodion<WG2267> my<WG3450> kinsman<WG4773>. Greet<WG782> them that are<WG3588> of<WG1537> the<WG3488> household of Narcissus<WG3488>, which are<WG5607> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.

Greet<WG782> Tryphena<WG5170> and<WG2532> Tryphosa<WG5173>, who labor<WG2872> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>. Greet<WG782> the beloved<WG27> Persis<WG4069>, which<WG3748> labored<WG2872> much<WG4183> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.
Greet<WG782> Rufus<WG4504> chosen<WG1588> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> and<WG2532> mine<WG1700>.
Greet<WG782> Asyncritus<WG799>, Phlegon<WG5393>, Hermas<WG2057>, Patrobas<WG3969>, Hermes<WG2060>, and<WG2532> the brothers<WG80> which are with<WG4862> them<WG846>.

Greet<WG782> Philologus<WG5378>, and<WG2532> Julia<WG2456>, Nereus<WG3517>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> sister<WG79>, and<WG2532> Olympas<WG3652>, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the saints<WG40> which are with<WG4862> them<WG846>.
Greet<WG782> one another<WG240> with<WG1722> a<WG5370> holy<WG40> kiss<WG5370>. The churches<WG1577> of Christ<WG5547> greet<WG782> you<WG5209>.

Now<WG1161> I beg<WG3870> you<WG5209>, brothers<WG80>, mark<WG4648> them which cause<WG4160> divisions<WG1370> and<WG2532> offenses<WG4625> contrary to<WG3844> the teaching<WG1322> which<WG3739> you<WG5210> have learned<WG3129>; and<WG2532> avoid<WG1578><WG99999> them<WG846>.

For<WG1063> they that are such<WG5108> serve<WG1398> not<WG3756> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, but<WG235> their own<WG1438> belly<WG2836>; and<WG2532> by<WG1223> good words<WG5542> and<WG2532> fair speeches<WG2129> deceive<WG1818> the hearts<WG2588> of the simple<WG172>.

For<WG1063> your<WG5216> obedience<WG5218> has become known<WG864> unto<WG1519> all<WG3956> men<WG5463>. I am glad therefore<WG3767> on<WG1909> your<WG5213> behalf<WG1909>: but yet<WG1161> I would have<WG2309> you<WG5209><WG99999> wise<WG4680> unto<WG1519> that which is good<WG18>, and<WG1161> simple<WG185> concerning<WG1519> evil<WG2556>.

And<WG1161> the God<WG2316> of peace<WG1515> shall bruise<WG4937> Satan<WG4567> under<WG5259> your<WG5216> feet<WG4228><WG99999> shortly<WG5034>. The grace<WG5485> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216>. Amen<WG281>.
Timotheus<WG5095> my<WG3450> fellow worker<WG4904>, and<WG2532> Lucius<WG3066>, and<WG2532> Jason<WG2394>, and<WG2532> Sosipater<WG4989>, my<WG3450> kinsmen<WG4773>, greet<WG782> you<WG5209>.
I<WG1473> Tertius<WG5060>, who wrote<WG1125> this letter<WG1992>, greet<WG782> you<WG5209> in<WG1722> the Lord<WG2962>.

Gaius<WG1050> my<WG3450> army<WG3581>, and<WG2532> of the<WG1577> whole<WG3650> church<WG1577>, greets<WG782> you<WG5209>. Erastus<WG2037> the chamberlain<WG3623> of the city<WG4172> greets<WG782> you<WG5209>, and<WG2532> Quartus<WG2890> a brother<WG80>.
The grace<WG5485> of<WG2962> our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> be with<WG3326> you<WG5216> all<WG3956>. Amen<WG281>.

Now<WG1161> to him that has the power<WG1410> to establish<WG4741> you<WG5209> according to<WG2596> my<WG3450> gospel<WG2098>, and<WG2532> the preaching<WG2782> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, according to<WG2596> the revelation<WG602> of the mystery<WG3466>, which was kept secret<WG4601><WG99999> since the world began<WG166>,

But<WG1161> now<WG3568> is made manifest<WG5319>, and<WG5037> by<WG1223> the scriptures<WG1124> of the prophets<WG4397>, according to<WG2596> the commandment<WG2003> of the<WG2316> everlasting<WG166> God<WG2316>, made known<WG1107> to<WG1519> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> for<WG1519> the obedience<WG5218> of faith<WG4102>:

To the only<WG3441> wise<WG4680> God<WG2316>, be<WG3739> glory<WG1391> through<WG1223> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> for<WG1519> ever<WG165>. Amen<WG1577>. Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
